title: She’s So Sweet - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Modern Day
author: 月照溪
description:
Xiang Wanwan is a little cowardly and soft-tempered. 

However, it doesn’t matter; although she has a timid personality, she has money! 

She felt like supporting Lu Ziqian was the most extraordinary thing she had done in her life; it took her all the courage she had mustered to do it. 

Lu Ziqian found it strange…

 Where did this little girl standing in front of him, with a height only at his chest level, get the courage to say that she wanted to take care of a CEO?>
